description:
Find different cats and return them to their previous catgirls view.
Try to create your own strategy for the game.
Explore this game!
A lovely crush will help you relax from reality.

- 45 levels of relaxing puzzle match game
- 5 amazing animated catgirls
- 30 awesome art catgirls
- relaxing music
- 2D animation performance
name: Lovely Crush
intro: Explore a little story about a few beautiful catgirls. Here you can relax, forget about all your problems, and enjoy a charming, relaxing puzzle game.
